LanguageData.NBO.Name: Need Bar Overflow
LanguageData.NBO.RestartReq_Tip: Some changes require game restart to take effect. Before that they may partially function.
LanguageData.NBO.RestartNReq_Tip: All changes are applied upon closing settings window. Game restart is not necessary unless otherwise noted.
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Race: Disable Need Overflow for some races
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Race_Tip: Races with defNames (preferred) or full names (in the game's current language) listed below cannot overflow their need bars. The list is comma-separated and case-insensitive. Names recognized by the mod will be highlighted.
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Apparel: Disable Need Overflow with some apparel
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Apparel_Tip: Pawns wearing apparel with defNames (preferred) or full names (in the game's current language) listed below cannot overflow their need bars. The list is comma-separated and case-insensitive. Names recognized by the mod will be highlighted.
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Hediff: Disable Need Overflow with some health conditions
LanguageData.NBO.NoOverf.Hediff_Tip: Pawns with health conditions with defNames (preferred) or full names (in the game's current language) listed below cannot overflow their need bars. The list is comma-separated and case-insensitive. Names recognized by the mod will be highlighted.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' food bars to overflow.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.OverfPerc_Tip: A pawn can reach max {0} food. The higher resulting value of this and the Food Overflow Bonus will apply.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.OverflowBonus_Tip: A pawn can consume {0} extra units of food. The higher resulting value of this and the Food Overflow Multiplier will apply.\n
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.DisableEating_Tip: If a pawn's food level is above {0}, the player cannot order the pawn to consume any more food. The pawn can still use drugs of 0 nutrition, and pawns under mental break can still eat in a food binge.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthDetails_Tip: These customizations will be applied as long as the relevant checkboxes are ticked, this just shows/hides the settings.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthEnable.HungerFactor_: If a pawn's food level is above 100%, their food need may drop faster.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthEnable.HealingFactor: If a pawn's food level is above 100%, their wounds heal slightly faster.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthEnable.MovingOffset_: If a pawn's food level is above 100%, they will move slower.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthEnable.EatingOffset_: If a pawn's food level is above 100%, they will eat slower.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthEnable.VomitFreq_Tip: If a pawn's food level is above 100%, they may occasionally vomit as a result.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.NonHumanMult_Tip: When non-humanlikes' food level is above 100%, they receive reduced effects from food overflow, as if they are overflowing by {0} as much.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.GourmandMult_Tip: When gourmand pawns' food level is above 100%, they receive reduced effects from food overflow, as if they are overflowing by {0} as much.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.ShowHediffLvl_Tip: Food overflow's health effects are visible when the pawn is above {0} full, this takes into account the previous two settings so those pawns may need to overflow more to show visible effects.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthStat.Level: When a pawn is at least {0} full...
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthStat.HungerFactor: Pawn's food level will drain at {0} speed
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthStat.MovingOffset: Pawn's moving ability will decrease by {0}
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthStat.VomitFreq: Pawn will vomit on average {0} times per day
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Food.HealthStat.EatingOffset: Pawn's eating speed will decrease by {0}
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' sleep bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum sleep level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.FastDrain: Lose Sleep Level Faster When Fully Rested: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.FastDrain_Tip: When a pawn's sleep level is above 100%, their sleep level will drop ({0} × Overflow Amount) faster when awake. The higher the sleep level and this setting is, the faster sleep level falls.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.SlowGain: Gain Sleep Level Slower When Fully Rested: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Rest.SlowGain_Tip: When a pawn's sleep level is above 100%, their sleep level will recover at the normal rate ÷ (100% + {0} × Overflow Amount) when sleeping. The higher the sleep level and this setting is, the less effective is oversleeping. This only affects sleeping activities and not other means of gaining sleep such as drug use.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' recreation bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum recreation level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.FastDrain: Lose Recreation Faster When Overjoyed: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.FastDrain_Tip: When a pawn's recreation level is above 100%, their recreation level will drop ({0} × Overflow Amount) faster. The higher the recreation level and this setting is, the faster recreation level falls.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.SlowGain: Gain Recreation Slower When Overjoyed: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Joy.SlowGain_Tip: When a pawn's recreation level is above 100%, their recreation level will recover at the normal rate ÷ (100% + {0} × Overflow Amount). The higher the recreation level and this setting is, the less will be gained.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Mood.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' mood bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Mood.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum mood a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Beauty.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' beauty bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Beauty.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum beauty level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Comfort.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' comfort bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Comfort.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum comfort level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Chemical.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' chemical bars to overflow, this kind of need usually require some special category of drugs and are often caused by an addiction.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Chemical.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum chemical level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Chemical_Any.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' chemical bars to overflow, this kind of need usually does not distinguish drugs and are often caused by pawns' traits.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Chemical_Any.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum chemical level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Outdoors.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' outdoors bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Outdoors.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum outdoors level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Indoors.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' indoors bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Indoors.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum indoors level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Suppression.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow slaves' suppression bars to overflow, though there is no vanilla way to overflow this bar.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Suppression.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum suppression level a slave can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_RoomSize.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' room size bars to overflow, though there is no vanilla method to overflow this bar.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_RoomSize.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum room size level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Deathrest.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' deathrest bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Deathrest.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum deathrest level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' kill satiety bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum kill satiety a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.FastDrain: Kill Satiety Drain Faster When Overflowing: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.FastDrain_Tip: When a pawn's kill satiety is above 100%, their kill satiety will drop ({0} × Overflow Amount) faster. The higher the kill satiety and this setting is, the faster it falls.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.SlowGain: Kill Satiated Less When Overflowing: {0} Effect
LanguageData.NBO.Need_KillThirst.SlowGain_Tip: When a pawn's kill satiety is above 100%, additional kills will only satiate by 100% ÷ (100% + {0} × Overflow Amount). The higher the kill satiety and this setting is, the less will be satiated.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_MechEnergy.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow mechanoids' energy bars to overflow
LanguageData.NBO.Need_MechEnergy.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum energy level a mechanoid can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Learning.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow children' learning bars to overflow, though there is no vanilla method to overflow this bar.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Learning.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum learning level a child can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Play.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow babies' play bars to overflow, though there is no vanilla method to overflow this bar.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Play.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum play level a baby can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.ShowHiddenSettings_Tip: The settings below either aren't implemented in vanilla or are inherently buggy, so you might want to keep them off. Note that this checkbox only hides/unhides the settings and you still need to turn them off individually if they are on.
LanguageData.NBO.Need.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' any kind of currently unsupported needs to overflow. This may lead to many unexpected behaviors/bugs, but this is the only option if you really want some modded need bars to overflow.
LanguageData.NBO.Need.OverfPerc_Tip: Of any currently unsupported needs, the maximum need level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Authority.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' authority bars to overflow, though this is just a dummy need so it likely doesn't do anything.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Authority.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum authority level a pawn can reach is {0}.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Sadism.OverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' sadism bars to overflow, this need is not complete in the vanilla game so it likely doesn't do anything.
LanguageData.NBO.Need_Sadism.OverfPerc_Tip: The maximum sadism level a pawn can reach is {0}.
